title: september 24: the time Donald Trump was impeached (and nothing happened)
description:
It was a cultural reset. Trump won the presidential election against Hilary Clinton that sent the world population into shock (cue jaws dropping). Theories were made and speculations were voiced about how our “current” president became, well… president. On this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia discusses the fishy tale around how Trump came to presidency and an impeachment accusation that could have taken him out. Along with this, Maia reveals the history of the iconic song “Smells Like Teen Spirit” and what the album cover art is all about. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms. Distributed by Talkhouse.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
